headline: Electric vehicle sales are booming in South America — without Tesla
summary: MONTEVIDEO/LIMA (Reuters) -When Peruvian green energy entrepreneur Luis Zwiebach wanted to buy an electric vehicle in 2019, he flew 4,000 miles to California to test drive Tesla’s Model 3 sedan.  “There was a gentleman who had already imported one and wanted to sell it,” Zwiebach said.  Charging the Tesla initially proved difficult at his friend’s beach house outside Lima.

content.title: Electric vehicle sales are booming in South America — without Tesla

Charging the Tesla initially proved difficult at his friend’s beach house outside Lima.

headline: Peter Thiel’s Fund Sold Off Entire Nvidia Stake in Third Quarter
summary: The filing comes not long after SoftBank Group Corp. announced a similar move to sell off its shares in Nvidia in October for $5.83 billion.  Thiel has been less bullish on artificial intelligence development than SoftBank founder Masayoshi Son, but both men opted to exit their holdings in the world’s most valuable company at a time of rising concern about an AI investment bubble.  Nvidia’s shares are up just roughly 2% since the end of September.

content.title: Peter Thiel’s Fund Sold Off Entire Nvidia Stake in Third Quarter
content.summary: The filing comes not long after SoftBank Group Corp. announced a similar move to sell off its shares in Nvidia in October for $5.83 billion.  Thiel has been less bullish on artificial intelligence development than SoftBank founder Masayoshi Son, but both men opted to exit their holdings in the world’s most valuable company at a time of rising concern about an AI investment bubble.  Nvidia’s shares are up just roughly 2% since the end of September.

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Alphabet, XPeng, Tesla
summary: ↗️ Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL): Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A, BRK.B) added Google's parent company to its portfolio last quarter and further shrunk its stake in Apple (AAPL). Alphabet shares jumped more than 5% in premarket trading.

headline: Peter Thiel Cuts Stake In PayPal Mafia Company Tesla. Musk Issues This Warning.
summary: Peter Thiel's hedge fund Thiel Macro sold around 76% of its stake in Tesla during the third quarter, according to the 13F filing, as the billionaire decided to reduce his holdings in fellow PayPal Mafia-member Elon Musk's EV giant amid possible AI bubble risks.  Thiel Macro sold 207,613 TSLA shares in Q3, cutting its Tesla position by about 76%.  After those sales, Thiel's fund holds 65,000 shares of Tesla, which remain its largest investment, valued at $28.91 million and representing 38.83% of the portfolio.

content.title: Peter Thiel Cuts Stake In PayPal Mafia Company Tesla. Musk Issues This Warning.
content.summary: Peter Thiel's hedge fund Thiel Macro sold around 76% of its stake in Tesla during the third quarter, according to the 13F filing, as the billionaire decided to reduce his holdings in fellow PayPal Mafia-member Elon Musk's EV giant amid possible AI bubble risks.  Thiel Macro sold 207,613 TSLA shares in Q3, cutting its Tesla position by about 76%.  After those sales, Thiel's fund holds 65,000 shares of Tesla, which remain its largest investment, valued at $28.91 million and representing 38.83% of the portfolio.

headline: Stifel lifts Tesla price target on accelerating FSD and robotaxi progress
summary: Investing.com -- Stifel has raised its price target on Tesla to $508 from $483, citing stronger-than-expected advances in full self-driving (FSD) and robotaxi development, two areas the firm views as “critical to value creation.”

headline: Peter Thiel’s Fund Sold Off Entire Nvidia Stake Last Quarter
summary: The Thiel Macro fund now counts Apple Inc., Microsoft Corp. and a reduced stake in Tesla Inc. as its main bets, according to a 13F filing.  Thiel’s move comes at a time of rising concerns about an AI investment bubble, which turned Nvidia into the world’s most valuable company.

content.title: Peter Thiel’s Fund Sold Off Entire Nvidia Stake Last Quarter
content.summary: The Thiel Macro fund now counts Apple Inc., Microsoft Corp. and a reduced stake in Tesla Inc. as its main bets, according to a 13F filing.  Thiel’s move comes at a time of rising concerns about an AI investment bubble, which turned Nvidia into the world’s most valuable company.

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Alphabet, XPeng, Zymeworks
summary: ↗️ Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL): Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A, BRK.B) added Google's parent company to its portfolio last quarter and further shrunk its stake in Apple (AAPL). Alphabet shares jumped more than 4% in premarket trading, while shares in the iPhone maker edged lower.

content.title: Stocks to Watch Monday: Alphabet, XPeng, Zymeworks

Alphabet shares jumped more than 4% in premarket trading, while shares in the iPhone maker edged lower.

headline: Peter Thiel's fund offloaded Nvidia stake in third quarter, filing shows
summary: Thiel's selloff,‌ coupled with SoftBank's sale of its own Nvidia holdings last week, has fueled Wall Street'‍s angst that the frenzy driving soaring tech valuations may have peaked, putting at risk the trillions of dollars committed to AI advancement.  Investors and ​analysts will be looking to Nvidia's third-quarter results on ‌Wednesday to dispel worries of a bubble as the world's most valuable company is considered a bellwether for AI demand due to its coveted chips being used in massive data centers and servers.  Thiel Foundation did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.

content.title: Peter Thiel's fund offloaded Nvidia stake in third quarter, filing shows
content.summary: Thiel's selloff,‌ coupled with SoftBank's sale of its own Nvidia holdings last week, has fueled Wall Street'‍s angst that the frenzy driving soaring tech valuations may have peaked, putting at risk the trillions of dollars committed to AI advancement.  Investors and ​analysts will be looking to Nvidia's third-quarter results on ‌Wednesday to dispel worries of a bubble as the world's most valuable company is considered a bellwether for AI demand due to its coveted chips being used in massive data centers and servers.  Thiel Foundation did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.

headline: Elon Musk Just Spoke at an Investor Conference. Tesla Stock Is Falling.
summary: Tesla  stock was down slightly early on Monday after CEO Elon Musk caught up with one of his “true and tested friends” on Friday.  Shares of the electric vehicle maker were off 1.4% in premarket trading at $401, while  and  futures were up 0.2% and 0.1%, respectively.  On Friday, CEO Elon Musk spoke with Rob Baron, his “true and tested friend,” as well as a longtime Tesla and SpaceX shareholder, at the annual Baron Capital Investment Conference.

content.title: Elon Musk Just Spoke at an Investor Conference. Tesla Stock Is Falling.
content.summary: Tesla  stock was down slightly early on Monday after CEO Elon Musk caught up with one of his “true and tested friends” on Friday.  Shares of the electric vehicle maker were off 1.4% in premarket trading at $401, while  and  futures were up 0.2% and 0.1%, respectively.  On Friday, CEO Elon Musk spoke with Rob Baron, his “true and tested friend,” as well as a longtime Tesla and SpaceX shareholder, at the annual Baron Capital Investment Conference.
